original_text: That he may establish thee to day for a people unto himself, and that he may be unto thee a God, as he hath said unto thee, and as he hath sworn unto thy fathers, to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob.
korean_text: 여호와께서 네게 말씀하신 대로 또 네 조상 아브라함과 이삭과 야곱에게 맹세하신 대로 오늘 너를 세워 자기 백성을 삼으시고 그는 친히 네 하나님이 되시려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: That he may establish thee to day
and that he may be unto thee a God
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 너에게 하나님이 되시기 위하여

sentences.original_text: as he hath said unto thee
and as he hath sworn unto thy fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 네 조상들에게 맹세하신 바와 같이

sentences.original_text: to Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob
